name: Tiny Vanguard
description:
Armies colliding in 2D strategic button mashing combat!

Tiny vanguard has you holding the unrelenting hordes at bay! Send units towards the enemy and keep them away from your command post until help arrives!

Made for the Weekly Game Jam (Week 82, theme TV)

Music thanks to Patrik Herman! (Soundcloud and Spotify links below)

https://soundcloud.com/patrik-herman-composer

https://open.spotify.com/artist/1G09BIVkbxzU8wLLdJVDgY?si=BrfaegxxSbadFxrRdIIs-w


Controls:

AD or Left Right to move Camera

Left Click mouse on button to send units

or 1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8 Hotkeys for units
